Muon slice FTK ttbar sample MuonSlice FTK ttbar sample EventMax=5000;doIDNewTracking=True;doFTK=True TrigInDetValidation/TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_MuonSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long

exeParamString data-muon-FTK.root data-FTK_mu_ttbar_offline-reference.root HLT_mu24_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_IDTrig HLT_mu24_FTK_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_FTK_IDTrig HLT_mu24_FTKRefit_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_FTKRefit_IDTrig -d HLTEF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArun.sh
